attributes.action: Do you support the building of a new Royal Yacht for the Queen?
attributes.additional_details: The former Royal Yacht proved her value as a vehicle to promote Britain's interests abroad in multiple ways. The benefits to our country far surpassed the costs of building and maintaining her. The Queen is our Head of State and Chief Ambassador abroad she should have a new Royal Yacht made available to her and the various other important previous users of the former Royal Yacht as soon as possible so that the lost benefits to our country can be restored.
